name: Pet Rescue
summary: Freshly graduated from firefighter school, you have been sent out on your first real assignment. A number of pets have been trapped in a skyscraper on fire! Your job is to save these animals and, if possible, put out the fire.
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: 益智
  • 游玩人数: 单人
  • 官方网站: http://www.king.com/games/puzzle-games/pet-rescue
